#summary Prepare drive for safe removal

=== Description ===

 I'm lazy to select drive (in the Drive menu !AltF1/!AltF2) and depress !ShiftDel. So, depressing AltB (AltE) will prepare drive B: (E:) for safe removal.

=== Text===
{{{
macro Descr="Safe remove drive B/E" Area="Disks" Key="AltB AltE"
{{
  %s = Key(#AKey);  
  %c = substr(%s, len(%s) - 1, 1);
  $if (checkhotkey(%c)) Menu.Select(%c+":",1) ShiftDel Enter $end
}}
}}}
